name: Brand New Key
description:
Brand New Key is an interactive music video from Sharkk Heartt. Guide the roller girl across the ruined city collecting lost hearts as she chases an elusive skate key. Follow Sharkk Heartt on PATREON!

Controls: up/down arrows

...featuring a cover of the song "Brand New Key" by Melanie. Song produced by Kevin Larkin. Game created by Kevin Hainline.

(If you download the Mac version and you get an error message that I'm an unidentified developer, just right click the game and select open, and then say YES you want to play the game OF COURSE, JEEZ APPLE)
